attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keep the Fox Hunting with or without hounds BANNED, also Stag Hunting and any other Hunting that causes inhumane and unnecessary torture  to wild animals.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep the Fox Hunting Ban."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22258


Prime Minister's Office
